name: @codecn/inertia-field-input
description: An opinionated form input component for Laravel + Inertia.js + React + shadcn/ui projects

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts --external react --external react-dom --external @inertiajs/react --external @radix-ui/react-label --external @radix-ui/react-checkbox --external lucide-react --external react-day-picker --external @radix-ui/react-popover --external @radix-ui/react-select --external @radix-ui/react-dialog --external cmdk --external clsx --external date-fns --external class-variance-authority
scripts.watch: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts --external react --external react-dom --external @inertiajs/react --external @radix-ui/react-label --external @radix-ui/react-checkbox --external lucide-react --external react-day-picker --external @radix-ui/react-popover --external @radix-ui/react-select --external @radix-ui/react-dialog --external cmdk --external clsx --external date-fns --external class-variance-authority --watch
